grsyncx requires a permission to access your Desktop folder as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access your Documents folder as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access your Downloads folder as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access network volumes as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access removable volumes as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access Photo Library data as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access Calendars data as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access Reminders data as you've selected it to be synchronized.
grsyncx requires a permission to access Contacts data as you've selected it to be synchronized.
